name: Little Fisherman
description:
Move your mouse and hold down the mouse to shoot. Try and catch some fish! Make sure to full screen the game too.

This is my first Unity game! Well I guess it's more of an idea because it's not finished. I wish I had more time to work on it but I have tons of homework and tests to study for :P  Maybe I'll be able to work on it a little more before the Jam ends. Tell me what you think of the idea and if you have any tips on making games or game jams in general!

Weekly Game Jam - Week 194

Theme: Little Boat
